document.full_text: rising inventories of unsold cellphones and slower demand growth in emerging countries will cap cellphone market growth in 2011, research firm gartner said on thursday.
document.title: inventories to cap phone market growth: gartner
lines_and_colors: rising inventories of unsold cellphones and slower demand growth in emerging countries will cap cellphone market growth in 2011, research firm gartner said on thursday.
